Name: ECLIPSE - Partial [A05]
Description:
REQUIRES CD2 beta 15b+, MEV v5.4, DEA. Recommended VEA. This is a harder Version of Send it! Interstellar with Gradual Difficulty increase (Start at Lv3) by time. Each 50 Golds in Deposit Bank will recover 90s of Threat Meter. Do not enable mods that clean up the Gold Chunk as this will make the difficulty even more harder or Having Beer that buffs Gold ratio to make difficulty easier.
      Alpha 05:
    - Every 50 Gold Deposited, Recharge 90s -> 72s of Threat Meter/Gauge.
    - The Sun, The Moon and Jupiter: Rarity 9 -> 8. Difficulty Rating 150 -> 110.
    - Sabotage: No longer pause Normal Wave during Caretaker fight. However, ECM reduces further x0.6 -> x0.5.
    - Mini Boss WaveSpawner adjustments:
    + Solaris: Unable to spawn During Defend and Heartstone phase.
    + Joker: Unable to spawn During Defend.
    + Youngnought and Ice variant: Spawnspread increase to 2500cm (25m) during Defend, otherwise increase to 1000 (10m).
    - Patrol Bot, Elite Guard, Shellback, Youngling and Stalker: Added Cooldown of 120s once spawned.
    - Crawler and Ninja: Added Cooldown of 90s once spawned. 
    - Grenade Spitter: Changed Material to have better visibility in Darkness. Damage Dealt increase by 13.3%.

ED_Welcome_Message.DisplayName: Welcome to Eclipse. Every 50 Gold Deposit will recharge the Threat Meter.
